name: @augurproject/core
description: Core augur contracts and deployment process
author: The Augur Developers <team@augur.net>

scripts.build:contracts: node -r ts-node/register source/deployment/compileContracts.ts && npm run build:documentation
scripts.build:with-lint: npm run build:source && npm run lint && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:interfaces && npm run build:source && npm run build:artifacts
scripts.build: npm run build:source && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:interfaces && npm run build:source && npm run build:artifacts
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:source && npm run lint && cross-env ENABLE_SOLIDITY_DEBUG=true npm run build:interfaces && npm run build:source
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:net -- aura clique rinkeby
scripts.docker:run:test:security:maian: docker-compose -f ./source/support/test/integration/docker-compose-geth.yml up --abort-on-container-exit && docker cp integration_geth-integration-tests_1:/augur/packages/augur-core/output/contracts/ contracts/ && docker run -v `pwd`/contracts:/augur/packages/augur-core/output/contracts/ cryptomental/maian-augur-ci python /scripts/test_runner.py
scripts.docker:run:test:geth: npm run docker:run:test:unit:all && npm run docker:run:test:integration:geth
scripts.docker:run:test:parity: npm run docker:run:test:unit:all && npm run docker:run:test:integration:parity
scripts.docker:run:deploy: npm run docker:run:deploy:net -- aura clique rinkeby
scripts.docker:npm: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:npm
scripts.docker:shell: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:shell
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:test:geth
scripts.docker:test:geth: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:test:geth
scripts.docker:test:parity: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:test:parity
scripts.docker:test:unit: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:test:unit
scripts.docker:test:unit:all: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:test:unit:all
scripts.docker:deploy:net: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:deploy:net
scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:deploy:net -- aura clique rinkeby
